name: freudenberg:consulting
goal: freudenberg:consulting advises companies, associations, and communication agencies. The focus is in particular on the energy and climate policy of the European Union. The overall target is to provide an appropriate insight into the complex field of EU energy policy and the multifaceted political framework of the European Union.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
The priorities are energy policy, climate policy, environment policy and cohesion policy.

The focus is on the following packages and the related dossiers : Clean Energy Package, Cyber Security Package,
Mobility Package, Sustainable Finance Package, MFF
customers: European Federation of Local Energy Companies
